item.description:
This will be the 3rd Common Man's Marathon and third time that the Club has volunteered at the event.  They are looking for people to run in the race or help volunteer.  This is a fun race, benefiting two great running organizations and we definitely need to have a fun event in light of everything.

 

We'll meetup for a dim sum lunch afterwards.


This race is based on the premise that running is not only for the fittest and the fastest. The 2.62 mile Common Man's Marathon is manageable for beginning runners, couch potatoes and walkers.   Our scenic course loops several times around the nation’s oldest public park, the Boston Common. This mini marathon is anything but common!

 

Register below:

http://www.commonmansmarathon.com/
item.how_to_find_us: I'll provide my phone number to all attendees

group.name: Boston Rotaract - A Service/Social Club for 18-30 Yr Olds

item.name: Common Man's Marathon (and Lunch)
